entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hunters Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
